contentinfo.sup: Hello, nice to meet you. ğŸ‘‹
contentinfo.name: I am Efu
contentinfo.title: He is a student, software engineer, independent developer, and open source worker.

cause.title: Why build a website?
cause.content:
When I created this website, I wanted to have a place where I could accumulate knowledge and interests. Sharing with others will make these accumulations and precipitation. If you can help more people and help more people solve problems, it must be a great thing.
Unlike most vertical technical blogs, the genre here will be very complicated, with skill tutorials, life complaints and tips, and thoughts and ideas on topics. Usually what I research and what I find will be shared here.
These are the original intentions of creating this little station, and it is also the way I share my life. I am fortunate to be here with you, and I believe that we can leave a good memory together.

award.description: Thank you to the people who appreciated it, because you made me feel that blogging can be valuable to you. This will take me further down this path.
award.tips: The total amount: Â¥ {sum}, all will be used for the maintenance and renewal of the blog.

links.descr: Excellent bloggers who participate in the development of this site, provide design inspiration, and donate to this site
